Class Book

java.lang.Object
Book
public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
A class that stores information about a single book. This information includes a serial number, the name of the book, check out status, and the date its been published.
Author:
Abimanyu Ananthu, Ashish Shenoy

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Book​(java.lang.String name, Date datePublished)
    Constructor that creates an instance of the book class.

    Compares the dates between 2 books

    Returns the serial Number of a book as an integer

    Returns the value of the checkedOut instance variable

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book​(java.lang.String name, Date datePublished)
      Constructor that creates an instance of the book class. Upon instantiation, checkedOut and serialNumber are automatically assigned their respective values
      Parameters:
      name - - name of the book
      datePublished - - Date object showing the books publish date

  • Method Details

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Compares two books' serial number and returns either true or false depending on the result.
      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the Book we are comparing
      Returns:
      true if the books have the same serial number false otherwise

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Prints out all the information about the book in the required format
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      String containing the books information

    • compareDates

      public boolean compareDates​(Book book)
      Compares the dates between 2 books
      Parameters:
      book - - book
      Returns:
      true if the book we are calling the method on is earlier that the param book, false otherwise

    • toggleStatus

      public void toggleStatus()
      Toggles the checkedOut field of a book. Invoked when client requests to check out or return a book.

    • getStatus

      public boolean getStatus()
      Returns the value of the checkedOut instance variable
      Returns:
      true if the book is currently checked out, false otherwise

    • getSerialNumber

      public int getSerialNumber()
      Returns the serial Number of a book as an integer
      Returns:
      integer value that is greater than or equal to 10001

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
